backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder for backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregates feature implementation details, associated files, components, and confidence metadata for build tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and theme variables, including light/dark color schemes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts, metadata, and root element for the React Valentine app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the ValentineFlow component as the main application view.
frontend/src/components/valentine/assets: Exports paths for static assets like the couple hero image and hearts pattern.
frontend/src/components/valentine/conten: Provides shayari text, song metadata, quotes, and date ideas used across Valentine steps.
frontend/src/components/valentine/hooks/: Implements logic for an evasive button that moves when the user approaches via pointer or touch.
Ensures only one audio track plays at a time with play/pause management and error handling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/steps/: Displays a scrollable list of virtual date ideas with icons and a back button in a styled card layout.
Displays a congratulatory screen with a heart animation, an image, and a continue button.
Shows a playlist of songs with play/pause controls using a single-audio hook and navigation buttons.
Renders a Valentine proposal with an evasive 'No' button and a fixed 'Yes' button.
Lists romantic quotes in styled cards with back and continue navigation.
Displays a block of shayari text with back and continue buttons.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Controls the multi-step Valentine experience with state-driven navigation across proposal, content, and finale steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, global fonts, and custom animations/utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements for a multi-step romantic Valentine web experience with proposal, images, shayari, songs, quotes, and date ideas.
